i1.name: Duelist's Dance
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Fiora''' identifies the {{as|Vitals|buzzword}} of nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champions, marked as an arc around themselves. {{as|Vitals|buzzword}} take {{fd|0.5}} seconds to identify and linger for 15 seconds while '''Fiora''' remains {{tip|sight|visible}} and nearby. After a {{as|Vital|buzzword}} is triggered or times out, '''Fiora''' identifies a new one on her target.

Successful [[Basic attack]]s and damaging [[Champion ability|abilities]] against a {{as|Vital|buzzword}} trigger it to deal {{as|{{fd|2.5}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|4.5}}% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{tip|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}}, {{tip|heal}} '''Fiora''' for {{sti|health|{{pp|40 to 115|color=health}}}} and grant her {{pp|type=[[File:Grand Challenge.png|20px|link=]] Grand Challenge's Rank|key=%|4|showtype=true|20 to 50|0 to 3|displayformula=20%+(10%*Grand Challenge's Rank)|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
i1.notes:
* A {{as|Vital's|buzzword}} angle is fixed to the champion's model and doesn't interact with its orientation.
* If '''Fiora''' is on or excessively close to her target, she cannot hit {{as|Vitals|buzzword}}.

q1.name: Lunge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fiora''' {{tip|dashes}} a short distance in the target direction then stabs a nearby enemy if one is present. Stabbing an enemy reduces ''Lunge's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by 60%.
The stab deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} and applies [[on-hit effect]]s.
q1.notes:
* The stab prioritizes in order of:
** Enemy champion affected by {{ai|Grand Challenge|Fiora}}.
** {{as|Vitals|buzzword}} facing '''Fiora'''.
** Champions who would die to the strike.
** The nearest champion.
** Enemies that would die to the strike.
** The closest enemy.
* ''Lunge'' can target stealthed units and those hidden in the fog of war.
* The [[dash]] '''can''' pass through walls.
* Cannot be cancelled by {{tip|stasis}} or {{tip|airborne|displacement}} effects.
* Will land (priority order unchanged) even if ''Fiora'' dies.
* Will be disabled if ''Fiora'' is {{tip|ground|grounded}}.
* ''Lunge''s dash speed is affected by movement speed.

w1.name: Riposte
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fiora''' poises to strike in the target direction, becoming {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}} to non-[[turret]] damage as well as gaining {{tip|crowd control}} and [[debuff]] immunity for the next {{fd|0.75}} seconds. '''Fiora''' is immobile while poised.
After the duration, '''Fiora''' stabs her sword forward, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to enemies in a line.

The first enemy champion struck is also {{tip|slow|slowed}} and {{tip|cripple|crippled}} by 50% for 2 seconds. If '''Fiora''' parries at least one immobilizing effect, ''Riposte'' {{tip|stun|stuns}} the target for the same duration instead.

e1.name: Bladework
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fiora's''' next two basic attacks within {{tt|4 seconds|Estimated}} gain {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}} and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.

The first basic attack can never {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}, but {{tip|slow|slows}} its target by 30% for 1 second, while the second basic attack is guaranteed to {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|100}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, reduced by an additive amount.
e1.notes:
* {{ai|Lunge|Fiora}} cannot apply ''Bladework's'' first attack's slow.
* ''Bladework'' will go on cooldown after either its buff wears off or both basic attacks are consumed.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single hit.

r1.name: Grand Challenge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fiora''' challenges the target enemy champion for 8 seconds, highlighting their four {{as|Vitals|buzzword}} and creates an area around them. While in effect, {{ai|Duelist's Dance|Fiora}} does not identify new {{as|Vitals|buzzword}} on '''Fiora's''' target.
While near the target, '''Fiora''' gains {{ais|Duelist's Dance|Fiora}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.

If she triggers at least one {{as|Vital|buzzword}} before her target [[death|dies]], or triggers all four, she creates a {{ai|Grand Challenge 2|Fiora|''Victory Zone''}} that {{tip|heals}} all allied champions within it for {{pp|4|changedisplay=true|type=Vitals hit|2 to 5|color=buzzword}} seconds.
r1.notes:
* ''Grand Challenge'' is dispelled instantly if targeting a [[decoy]].
* Just like with {{ai|Duelist's Dance|Fiora}} it takes ''Grand Challenge'' {{fd|0.5}} seconds to identify all four {{as|Vitals|buzzword}}.
** If the target dies before all {{as|Vitals|buzzword}} are identified or '''Fiora''' didn't hit at least one {{as|Vital|buzzword}}, the {{ai|Grand Challenge 2|Fiora|Victory Zone}} will not trigger and the cooldown of the ability/mana spent are not refunded.
* The damage of this ability scales with {{ai|Duelist's Dance|Fiora}}.
* Even if '''Fiora''' dies, the {{ai|Grand Challenge 2|Fiora|''Victory Zone''}} will trigger so long as she hit at least one {{as|Vital|buzzword}} and they die before the {{as|Vitals|buzzword}} wear off.
** When triggering the {{ai|Grand Challenge 2|Fiora|''Victory Zone''}} the target is considered dead even if they are being revived (for example: {{ii|Guardian Angel}}, {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}}, {{ai|World Ender|Aatrox}}).
* Ally units in {{tip|stasis}} will not be {{tip|heal|healed}} by the {{ai|Grand Challenge 2|Fiora|Victory Zone}}.
** The {{ai|Grand Challenge 2|Fiora|Victory Zone}} can {{tip|heal}} the summoned {{ui|Rift Herald}}.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Heal Per Second|{{ap|80 to 140}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Heal|{{ap|80*5 to 140*5}} {{as|(+ 300% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
effects.str:
• Heal Per Second: (+ 60% bonus AD)
  • Maximum Heal: (+ 300% bonus AD)
